Class Bot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stephengware.java.games.chess.bot.Bot

extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract parent class of all chess playing bots.
    Author:
    Stephen G. Ware

    • Method Detail

      • choose

        public final State choose(State current)
        Given the current state of a chess game, this method chooses the next move for current player (i.e. State.player). This method should return one of the children of state object it is passed.
        Parameters:
        current - the current state of the game
        Returns:
        a child of the root of the game tree whose root is the current state

      • chooseMove

        protected abstract State chooseMove(State current)
        Given the current State, this method chooses a next move for the current player (i.e. State.player). This method must return a child of current.
        Parameters:
        current - a state whose root is the current state of a chess game
        Returns:
        a child of the root (which indicates the next move the current player should make)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
